info: Rating, 3 stars,  路 October 2023,  路 Stayed with a pet
rating_comment: We stayed two nights and enjoyed ourselves. It was quiet and peaceful, and our host was very kind and helpful. The highlight was a boat trip up a narrow canal into the national park where we saw 3 otters, an eagle, lots of crabs and mudskippers, lots of deer and other tracks, and a colony of bees, which our guide harvested so that we could try some jungle honey. Yum! We also had 2 breakfasts, 2 lunches, and 2 dinners, and every meal was delicious. It was also nice that dogs were welcome. Some of the photos appear to be a different place, and the boat we took was not the one pictured, but these were not dealbreakers. Overall, we had a good time and would recommend Gol Kanon to others. Thank you!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 June 2023,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment: Extremely worth it. Gol Kanon is an absolutely one of a kind experience, with incredible views of the forest and a wide variety of delicious local food items. I recommend it wholeheartedly to anyone looking for an authentic, sustainable experience of Sundarban!!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 November 2022,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Awsome way to see a little bit of the Sumdarban. We loved to just paddle of alone into the canals from the cabin.
The boat we borrowed was a bit large, so it was a bit of a stuggle for me to handle it alone against the tidal current. So either go inn to the Sundarban with the rising tide, and go back with the eb. Or try to borrow a smaller boat (or just bring a guide, to help you paddle, if you do not feel like having an actuall adventure...)
Friendly staf, friendly neighbours and a beautifull area both into the Sundarban and on the village side.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 March 2020,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment:
The most hospitable and humble hosts.
Must be prepared for a full contact with nature (including some lizards in the bedroom, but a mosquito net is provided, and you're sleeping in the jungle, do it's part of the experience). Beautiful location and the food: 5*!! Being a vegetarian was not a problem at all. Thank you for a great stay in the Sundarbans

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 February 2020,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment: No words can ever sum up how amazing our short but sweet stay at Gol Kanon was!! The amazing people, great food, and tranquil surroundings made for a truly unforgettable trip which we will forever treasure. Extremely homely, it did not ever feel like we were guests at a resort, but more so like family visiting over. We shall definitely be back to visit Shree Pati and his special family in the near future!!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 February 2020,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Gol Kanon is truly a very special place as we found out during our short but sweet stay during our trip to the Sundarbans. More than a resort, it really felt like a home away from home and the family we met running the place are amazing individuals who made our visit there extra special. They always made sure our bellies were full with delicious organic food and I would highly recommend a stay here if you ever decide to go explore Sundarban. We will surely return in the near future!!

info: Rating, 4 stars,  路 December 2019,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment:
The lodge is located at a beautiful location where you will be surrounded by kingfishers, monkeys and the sound of nature. The food is fantastic, many dishes we never tried before. The people are very friendly.
Only downside for me was that it was not clear if transport was included and that the boat from Mongla to the other side was a big hassle where the boatmen kept insisting the price was 1500 (its actually 250-300, which we ended up paying after calling the eco-lodge to talk to the boatmen). And the price of the accommodation is quite high and still it felt like it was expected to donate in a box.
Nonetheless I think this is the place to go to in Sundarbans
Great place to stay to get a local's perspective on the Sundarbans.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 March 2019,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment:
Gokl Kanon is a very special place set in nature on the edge of the Sunderba forest.
The host Sripatti makes you feel very welcome and goes out of his way to please you.
The rooms are simple but clean and very eco friendly.
The foos is delicious and freshly cooked with local produce.
Even getting to the place is an adventure in itself.
I would suggest a minimum of 2 night to really appreciate the location and dont miss the boat trip and jungle walk.
I would love to come back and stay for a longer time.
As a solo female traveller I felt completely safe.

Gol Kanon is a special place. sitting right at the edge of the Sundarbans forest you will fall in love with the place also for is people, the food and the hospitality. you must also be aware though that this is a small village. there's plenty of solar electricity but a portable charger is recommended. there is a little issue with data but you can make calls easily. I had a Robi sim but Grameen works best I'm told. there's a little mobile tower not too far on the other side of the fields and walking 100 mts towards it got me 4g. the food is absolutely amazing. it's super fresh. grown locally and prepared traditionally. being a vegetarian I was worried but it turned out to be the best meals I've had in my two week Bangladesh trip. I was initially booked for 2 nights but I extended. you will be well taken care of and the family there is the sweetest. Nazmul has also been very helpful and understanding. looking forward to going back!
